amendment.description: Amendments en bloc comprised of amendments numbered 4, 5, 6, 7 as modified, 8, 9, 15, 17, 20, 21, 23 and 27 printed in Part B of House Report 114-569. See page D522 of the Congressional Record of May 17, 2016 for description of en bloc amendments.
amendment.purpose: An amendment compromised of the following amendments offered en bloc consisting of amendments numbered 4, 5, 6, 7 as modified, 8, 9, 15, 17, 20, 21, 23 and 27 printed in Part B of House Report 114-569.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Thornberry amendments (A002) as modified Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Thornberry amendment (A002) modified by unanimous consent. Modification applies to amendment No. 7 in the en bloc package.
Amendments en bloc (A002) offered by Mr. Thornberry.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Thornberry amendments (A002) as modified Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendments en bloc (A002) offered by Mr. Thornberry.
